Chat Session: Melissa & Dave Bemer & Betsy Bemer & Tim Bemer & David Bemer Jr. & Ellie Benner & Mary Hoetzel & Mike Stiles
Text:
Hi everyone.

 Just wanted to let everyone know the plan. 
I will be proposing around 1130/12 on 11/18 and then barb and I will do our own thing until we meet up with everyone later. 

Plan is for the immediate families to meet up around five at independence beer garden. Then other people are invited to join around six. 

I have not been able to get information about reserving our own area but I'm working on it. Melissa and MC said they may get there around early to set up or hold a spot. 

Any questions please let me.know!

Text:
Hi everyone. Had a little hiccup so pivoting plans a bit so here's the new and final itinerary! 

I will confirm reservation with The Plough & The Stars for 5:30pm (so they are ready for us).

10:30am Melissa, Kim, MC -    Decorate at 3 Hedgerow
12:00 pm - Proposal
1:00pm - Visit Mrs. Bemer & Enjoy time together
3:00pm - Family celebration at Mary's
6:00pm - 9pm(?) Extended Family/ Friends Celebration at The Plough & The Stars

Obviously day of timeline for proposal will adjust as needed but everything should go smooth.
